T02D2593:13b-40: steng gi zhal ni lha zhal dkar po'am /

T02D2593:13b-42: zhes pa nas de dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis
T02D2593:13b-43: 'khor lo'i rim pa ba stan pa yin no zhes
T02D2593:13b-44: bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i rim
T02D2593:13b-46: rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du shes par bya'o //
T02D2593:13b-47: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i ngo bo nyid gsang
T02D2593:13b-48: sngags kyi sgo nas de dag gi rim pa bskyed
T02D2593:14a-2: de dag ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting
T02D2593:14a-3: nge 'dzin to zhes pa'i bar gyis lha bsgom zhing
T02D2593:14a-4: dbyung ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed pa ba stan pa ste /
T02D2593:14a-5: dkyus ma nyid gsal ba'i phyir 'dir ma bkrol lo //
T02D2593:14a-6: 'on kyang sngags don rnam par gzigs pa las dkyil 'khor drug tu gsungs pa dang /
T02D2593:14a-7: gsang ldan 'di nyid las sngon du shes rab kyi 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du gsungs pas /
T02D2593:14a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi lhag ma gzhan yang bshad par bya ste /
T02D2593:14a-9: mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab kyi mtshan brjod pas /
T02D2593:14a-10: dkyil 'khor ba rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa'am ;
T02D2593:14a-11: yang na rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas cig car du sprul pa'o //
T02D2593:14a-12: de yang thabs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis dang /
T02D2593:14a-13: thabs khyad par gyi dkyil 'khor lnga dang bdun du shes par bya'o //
T02D2593:14a-14: gsang ldan 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i khongs su bsdu'o //
T02D2593:14a-15: khyad par gyi ni gzhal yas khang sgo gnyis pa'o //
T02D2593:14a-16: de nas las kyi khyad par yang //
T02D2593:14a-17: bskyed pa'i zhar las byung ba ste //
T02D2593:14a-18: sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas //
T02D2593:14a-19: 'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02D2593:14a-20: las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pas /
T02D2593:14a-21: las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ba stan pa ste /
T02D2593:14a-22: de nas las kyi khyad par yang //
T02D2593:14a-23: bskyed pa'i zhar las 'byung ba ste //
T02D2593:14a-25: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed nas las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par dam bcas pa'o //
T02D2593:14a-26: sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas //
T02D2593:14a-27: 'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02D2593:14a-28: zhes bya ba las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2593:14a-29: gyi rim pa bla mas shes par bya ba'i don
T02D2593:14a-30: to // bla ma'i man ngag ni bcu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste /
T02D2593:14a-32: rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas bsdu ba dang /
T02D2593:14a-33: mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' byon te /
T02D2593:14a-34: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal ba dang /
T02D2593:14a-36: spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2593:14a-37: sgos bkur gyi gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2593:14a-41: lha las spyar ba'i rim par shes par bya'o //
T02D2593:14a-42: de la de yang las mkhan rang byed la /
T02D2593:14b-1: dang po sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal gyis sdigs mdzub kyi se gol gtogs shing /
T02D2593:14b-3: sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo //
T02D2593:14b-4: yang na bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug par bsams te /
T02D2593:14b-5: khro bo h'um mdzad du bsgoms la khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2593:14b-6: mdzub mo gnyis lto sprad la drug tu brdabs pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2593:14b-7: aom badzro dgha ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
T02D2593:14b-8: zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo //
T02D2593:14b-10: de nas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni /
T02D2593:14b-11: sgrub pa po'i snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /
T02D2593:14b-12: mthe bo dang mdzub mo la zla ba'i steng du dza:bsams la /
T02D2593:14b-13: lag ngar gnyis rdo rje rgya gram gyi tshul du bsnol te /
T02D2593:14b-14: dpung pa gnyis su se gol gtogs shing /
T02D2593:14b-15: rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po //
T02D2593:14b-16: aom badzra sa m'a dza:dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02D2593:14b-18: mtheb mdzub kyi dza:las ye shes kyi 'od zer lcags kyu lta bur 'phros te /
T02D2593:14b-19: rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2593:14b-20: dam tshig pa dang 'dra ba byon par bsam mo
T02D2593:14b-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bdag / lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rjer bcing //
T02D2593:14b-23: rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis //
T02D2593:14b-24: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya ;
T02D2593:14b-26: byon te phyag 'tshal ba ba stan pa ni /
T02D2593:14b-27: de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dam tshig
T02D2593:14b-28: gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2593:14b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta /
T02D2593:14b-31: pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro m'i /
T02D2593:14b-32: zhes brjod cing dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal bar bsam mo //
T02D2593:14b-33: de nas ched du brjod pa ni //
T02D2593:14b-34: ae ma'o kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po yi //
T02D2593:14b-35: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02D2593:14b-36: dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes //
T02D2593:14b-37: zhes ched du brjod par bsam mo //
T02D2593:14b-38: de nas spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D2593:14b-39: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor nas spyan drangs pa'i lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum po thams cad /
T02D2593:14b-40: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs kar zhugs nas /
T02D2593:15a-0: spyi'i gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis @15a * //
T02D2593:15a-2: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs ka nas
T02D2593:15a-3: ye shes kyi lha tshogs 'thon te nam mkha' la
T02D2593:15a-4: gnas so // de nas sgos bkur ba'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D2593:15a-5: ae ma sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02D2593:15a-6: rgya chen gdod nas skye ba min //
T02D2593:15a-7: rdul phran ji snyed thams cad kyi //
T02D2593:15a-8: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //
T02D2593:15a-10: shar phyogs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi lha tshogs ni mi bskyod pa'i thugs kar zhugs te /
T02D2593:15a-11: mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2593:15a-12: mi bskyod pa'i thugs ka nas slar 'thon te /
T02D2593:15a-13: rang rang gi dam tshig gi lha byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02D2593:15a-14: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D2593:15a-15: de nas dbang nod pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste /
T02D2593:15a-16: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa dang /
T02D2593:15a-17: dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sgrub pa pos dbang nod pa'o ;
T02D2593:15a-18: / dam tshig la ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa ni /
T02D2593:15a-19: rigs lnga la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D2593:15a-20: de nas rigs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug mchod pa
T02D2593:15a-21: brgyang yum bzhi sgo ba dang sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2593:15a-22: la sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis
T02D2593:15a-24: bskal ba bzang po'i sems dpa' rnams la rin po
T02D2593:15a-25: che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bar
T02D2593:15a-26: bsam mo // de nas sgrub po pos dbang nod pa ni /
T02D2593:15a-28: ye shes pa rnams dam tshig pa rnams kyi thugs ka nas slar 'thon te /
T02D2593:15a-29: gdan re re la snang ba gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs pa la /
T02D2593:15a-30: sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i dbang lnga'am drug nos nas /
T02D2593:15a-31: dza:h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de slar thim par bsams pa'am /
T02D2593:15a-32: yang na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2593:15a-33: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu 'dres nas bzhugs pa la /
T02D2593:15a-34: sgrub pa pos dbang nos par bsam mo //
T02D2593:15a-35: ye shes ba slar 'thon te nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2593:15a-36: de yang dbang gis dbang rtags ni /
T02D2593:15a-37: sgrub pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po
T02D2593:15a-38: yin na rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs
T02D2593:15a-40: sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na /
T02D2593:15b-0: @15b de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D2593:15b-1: de nas sgrub pa pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
T02D2593:15b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na /
T02D2593:15b-3: yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02D2593:15b-4: sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na /
T02D2593:15b-5: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa yum bzhis byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02D2593:15b-6: de nas ye shes dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing pa dang dgyes par bya ba ni /
T02D2593:15b-7: sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drang ba ste /
T02D2593:15b-8: de yang rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas nang du bkug par bsam /
T02D2593:15b-9: rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcug par bsam /
T02D2593:15b-10: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcings par bsam /
T02D2593:15b-11: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas mnyes par bsam mo //
T02D2593:15b-12: de nas phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni gnyis te /
T02D2593:15b-15: rgyas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang rtsa ba'i
T02D2593:15b-16: rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba las shes par bya'o
T02D2593:15b-18: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab pa /
T02D2593:15b-19: sgrub pa bo'i snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02D2593:15b-20: gtso bo'i sngags rings kyi mjug la /
T02D2593:15b-21: dri shya dza:h'um bam ho:sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2593:15b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bsam mo //
T02D2593:15b-26: chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02D2593:15b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ljags kyi steng du
T02D2593:15b-28: h'um dkar po las yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje
T02D2593:15b-29: dkar po rtse lnga pa re chu rgyugs su yod
T02D2593:15b-30: par bsam / de'i lte ba la lha rnams rang rang gi sku skyed pa'i yig 'bru bkod la /
T02D2593:15b-31: chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par bsam mo //
T02D2593:15b-32: las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02D2593:15b-33: sgrub pa po'i snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2593:15b-34: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2593:15b-35: rdo rje'i gar dgu sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis /
T02D2593:15b-36: phyag mtshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs bsgom pa ni /
T02D2593:15b-37: las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab po //
T02D2593:15b-38: phyag mtshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni /
T02D2593:16a-1: kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste /
T02D2593:16a-2: rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te //
T02D2593:16a-3: mnyam par gzhag pas gnyis su bya //
T02D2593:16a-4: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas gnyis bcings te //
T02D2593:16a-5: de nas bcing ba rab tu bshad //
T02D2593:16a-6: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02D2593:16a-7: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D2593:16a-8: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
T02D2593:16a-9: sangs rgyas byang chub spyin byed pa'o //
T02D2593:16a-10: mi g-yo ba yis reg pa'o //
T02D2593:16a-11: rin chen gyi ni mchog spyin pa'o //
T02D2593:16a-12: tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin mchog / gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs spyin //
T02D2593:16a-13: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2593:16a-14: mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya //
T02D2593:16a-15: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2593:16a-16: rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste //
T02D2593:16a-17: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yin //
T02D2593:16a-18: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang //
T02D2593:16a-19: mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni //
T02D2593:16a-20: legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis //
T02D2593:16a-21: snying gar nyi ma ba stan par bya //
T02D2593:16a-22: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
T02D2593:16a-23: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02D2593:16a-24: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon par dbye //
T02D2593:16a-25: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri mdud //
T02D2593:16a-26: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02D2593:16a-27: rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung //
T02D2593:16a-28: rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yi //
T02D2593:16a-29: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag / go cha mthe chung mche ba dang //
T02D2593:16a-30: khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //
T02D2593:16a-31: rdo rje bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02D2593:16a-32: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02D2593:16a-33: phreng ba bcings dang kha nas dbyung //
T02D2593:16a-34: rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin //
T02D2593:16a-35: rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni //
T02D2593:16a-36: bdug pa la sogs de bzhin spyin ;
T02D2593:16a-37: / sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi //
T02D2593:16a-38: phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa po //
T02D2593:16a-39: mdzub mos lcags kyu bcings pa ni //
T02D2593:16a-40: mthe chung las de lcags kyu che //
T02D2593:16a-41: mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis mdud //
T02D2593:16a-42: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02D2593:16a-44: gsum pa la sogs pa lnga'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni /
T02D2593:16a-45: so so'i gtso bo bzhin du thabs re sgo re'am /
T02D2593:16a-47: de rnams ni 'dir mang du spro mi dgos pa'i phyir mang du ma spros pa'o /
T02D2593:16a-49: // / de nas phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02D2593:16a-50: sgrub pa po'i snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02D2593:16b-0: @16b rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02D2593:16b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po //
T02D2593:16b-2: aom h'um hr'i: zhes yid la zlos shing /
T02D2593:16b-3: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rdo rje gar ma byas par /
T02D2593:16b-4: rang rang gi phyag mtshan phyag na bsnams par bsgom pa ni /
T02D2593:16b-5: phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab par bsgom pa'o //
T02D2593:16b-6: de las lha las la spyar ba ni /
T02D2593:16b-8: de nas las kyi rgyal mchog ni //
T02D2593:16b-9: sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas //
T02D2593:16b-10: 'dir ni bdag gis ma bshad do //
T02D2593:16b-13: gsang ldan nam sgo dang po'i lha las la gzhag pa ni /
T02D2593:16b-14: lha'i dag pa dang mthun par las la gzhag ste /
T02D2593:16b-15: sngags don rnam par gzigs pa'i lha'i dag pa dang mthun no //
T02D2593:16b-16: sgo gnyis pa'i gti mug sel ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2593:16b-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis /
T02D2593:16b-18: sems can thams cad kyi gti mug sbyongs shig pa'o //
T02D2593:16b-19: de bzhin du zhe sdang dang ;
T02D2593:16b-23: yang na sngon gyi lha thams cad kyi spro bsdu dran par byas pa ni las la spyar ba'o //
T02D2593:16b-24: las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa ni /
T02D2593:16b-26: de nas spos kyi chu dag la //
T02D2593:16b-27: sngags bzlas pa yis bsang byas te //
T02D2593:16b-28: phung pos bsdu pa'i mchod pa lngas //
T02D2593:16b-29: rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas //
T02D2593:16b-31: se gol rim pas brdab byas pas //
T02D2593:16b-32: rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D2593:16b-34: mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas //
T02D2593:16b-36: 'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la //
T02D2593:16b-37: mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya //
T02D2593:16b-38: de nas gtso bo sngags rings la //
T02D2593:16b-39: dri shya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing //
T02D2593:16b-40: aa ham zhes dang ldan par ni //
T02D2593:16b-41: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog sgrub //
T02D2593:16b-42: de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis //
T02D2593:16b-43: mchod nas phyag bzhi bya ba ni //
T02D2593:16b-44: dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i //
T02D2593:16b-45: gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D2593:16b-46: de dag ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi ting
T02D2593:16b-47: nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D2593:16b-48: ting nge 'dzin ba stan pa ste /
T02D2593:16b-49: de dag ni yang spyi don dgu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste /
T02D2593:17a-2: sngags bzlas pa yis bsang bya ste //
T02D2593:17a-3: phung pos ba sdus pa'i mchod pa lnga //
T02D2593:17a-4: rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas //
T02D2593:17a-6: mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa ston te /
T02D2593:17a-7: spyir spyang zhing sreg pa dang /
T02D2593:17a-8: sgo sgo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2593:17a-10: 'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis //
T02D2593:17a-11: se gol rim par brdab byas pas //
T02D2593:17a-12: rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D2593:17a-14: mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas //
T02D2593:17a-16: rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba ston to //
T02D2593:17a-17: de yang rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas
T02D2593:17a-18: rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs la mdun gyi
T02D2593:17a-19: nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo //
T02D2593:17a-20: sa m'a dza:zhes brjod bya zhing //
T02D2593:17a-21: 'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la //
T02D2593:17a-22: mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya //
T02D2593:17a-23: zhes pas bstod pa ston te /
T02D2593:17a-24: sngags sngon du 'gro bas de nas bstod pa ni /
T02D2593:17a-27: de nas dgug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par bya ba ni /
T02D2593:17a-28: sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi
T02D2593:17a-29: nang du spyan drangs pa la sogs pa ste sngon
T02D2593:17a-30: bzhin no // de nas gtso bo'i sngags rings la //
T02D2593:17a-31: dri shya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing //
T02D2593:17a-32: a'a ham zhes dang ldan par ni //
T02D2593:17a-33: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog bsgrub //
T02D2593:17a-35: lha thams cad ni phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ste /
T02D2593:17a-36: de yang phyag rgyas gdab pa ni /
T02D2593:17a-37: las mchog gi skabs bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02D2593:17a-38: de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis //
T02D2593:17a-39: mchod nas zhes bya bas mchod pa dbul ba ston te /
T02D2593:17a-40: de yang mchod pa dbul ba ni //
T02D2593:17a-41: thun mong gi mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2593:17a-42: phyi nang gi lha mo brgyang kyi mchod pa dang /
T02D2593:17a-44: mchod pa gzhan yang ci 'byor tshad du dbul lo //
T02D2593:17a-46: dang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i ;
T02D2593:17a-47: / gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D2593:17a-48: zhes bya bas phyag btsal bar ston te /
T02D2593:17a-49: de yang phyag bzhi btsal ba ni //
T02D2593:17a-50: shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang /
T02D2593:17a-51: lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang /
T02D2593:17b-0: nub phyogs kyi sgo nas padma'i rigs kyi phyag btsal @17b ba dang /
T02D2593:17b-1: byang phyogs kyi sgo nas las kyi rigs kyi phyag btsal ba ste /
T02D2593:17b-2: lus kyi bca' thabs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim
T02D2593:17b-3: pa dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang phyogs dang lngas
T02D2593:17b-6: de'i 'og tu bla ma'i gdams ngag gis mnyam pa gsum dang bsnyen pa ni bsgom pa dang /
T02D2593:17b-7: mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab gdon pa dang sngags bzlas ba rnams ston pa ni /
T02D2593:17b-8: de yang mnyam pa rnam pa gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la /
T02D2593:17b-11: zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang
T02D2593:17b-12: bdag sku gsung thugs rdo rje mnyam pas mnyam pa
T02D2593:17b-13: nyid du bsam / aom sva bh'a wa bi shuddho& ham /
T02D2593:17b-15: lha thams cad dang bdag rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom /
T02D2593:17b-16: aom sarba sa mo& ham zhes brjod pas /
T02D2593:17b-17: lha thams cad dang bdag med par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom mo //
T02D2593:17b-18: de ltar mnyam pa nyid gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la /
T02D2593:17b-19: lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la bsgom pa dang /
T02D2593:17b-20: mtshan dang sngags kyi bzlas pa byed na yang /
T02D2593:17b-21: lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la /
T02D2593:17b-22: bdag gis mtshan dang sngags kyi bzlas pa byas pa'i
T02D2593:17b-23: dus su lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang bzlas
T02D2593:17b-25: de ltar byas nas bsnyen pa lngar 'gyur te /
T02D2593:17b-26: bsgom pa'i bsnyen pa la dus kyi bsnyen pa dang /
T02D2593:17b-27: mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa gnyis so //
T02D2593:17b-31: grangs kyi bsnyen pa dang gsum mo //
T02D2593:17b-32: de ltar bsnyen pa rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D2593:17b-33: de la sngags rnams 'di yin te /
T02D2593:17b-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i shva ra h'um /
T02D2593:17b-48: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um /
T02D2593:18a-5: aom badzra karma kam / aom badzra raksha ham /
T02D2593:18a-8: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:/
T02D2593:18a-11: aom badzra a'a be sha aa /
T02D2593:18a-12: khyad par gyi snying po'i sngags so //
T02D2593:18a-13: aom badzra pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye ya te na ma:/
T02D2593:18a-14: aom du:kha tstshe da ya te na ma:/
T02D2593:18a-15: aom badzra t'ikshna ya te na ma:/
T02D2593:18a-16: aom w'a g'i shva ra ya te na ma:/
T02D2593:18a-17: aom dzny'a na k'a ya ya te na ma:/
T02D2593:18a-18: aom aa ra pa tsa na ya te na ma:/
T02D2593:18a-20: go bzlog par shes par bya'o //
T02D2593:18a-21: aom sarba dharm'a aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba ;
T02D2593:18a-24: bra kri ta pa ri shuddha /
T02D2593:18a-27: sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na k'a ya /
T02D2593:18a-28: manydzu shr'i ba ri shuddhi ta mu ba da ya ti /
T02D2593:18a-30: sarba ta th'a gati hra da ya /
T02D2593:18a-34: dzny'a na m'urti w'a g'i shva ra /
T02D2593:18a-37: aa ma la su ba ri shuddha dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha aa:/
T02D2593:18a-39: lha thams cad kyi spyi'i sku'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i sngags dang phreng sngags so //
T02D2593:18a-42: // / de nas sgrub ba la 'jug pa ni /
T02D2593:18a-43: de nas rang dga'i gnas nyid du //
T02D2593:18a-44: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D2593:18a-46: bsgrub ba'i gnas dang bsgrub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba spyir mdor ba stan te /
T02D2593:18a-47: de yang gnas ni nyams dga' zhing yid 'jug pa /
T02D2593:18a-48: rgyal po dang theg pa dman pa la sogs pas dben par bya bar gsungs so //
T02D2593:18a-49: sa de gzhung bzhin spyang bya dang //
T02D2593:18a-50: gzung dang ldan pa gzhung bzhin du //
T02D2593:18a-51: bya ba'i bye brag gzhan na'o //
T02D2593:18a-53: sa'i cho ga rgyas par bya bar ston te /
T02D2593:18a-54: de yang bla mas gsang ba spyi dang rtsa rgyud
T02D2593:18a-55: chen po la sogs par sa'i cho ga spyi don
T02D2593:18a-56: brgyang kyis shes par bya ba ni /
T02D2593:18a-57: tshes gcig nas bco lnga'i bar du gza' skar bzang po la zhugs te /
T02D2593:18a-58: slob dpon slob ma'i spyod lam bya ba ni /
T02D2593:18a-59: za gcig gi smyung ba dang dkar gsum bza' ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam bya'o //
T02D2593:18a-62: lha khang la sogs pa'i shar ram byang phyogs su bri bar bya'o //
T02D2593:18b-0: de nas ji tsam byed pa'i dkyil 'khor @18b gyi
T02D2593:18b-1: sa bcad la sa'i lto 'phye brtag par byas la
T02D2593:18b-2: / lto ba nas sa brkos te sa'i ro lnga spangs pa dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D2593:18b-5: mi'i ro rus pa dang skra shad kyi dum bu dang /
T02D2593:18b-7: shing gi ro mgal du ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D2593:18b-8: rtsva'i ro phub ma la sogs pa med par bya'o //
T02D2593:18b-9: rgyal pos ni dkyil 'khor khru brgya lnga bcu pa la bya'o //
T02D2593:18b-10: blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu pa la'am de'i phyed la bya'o //
T02D2593:18b-11: sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug la bya'o //
T02D2593:18b-12: sa brtag pa ni nyis 'gyur tshun du brtag go //
T02D2593:18b-13: de nas yul gyi rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa la bslang ba'o //
T02D2593:18b-14: sa'i lha mo la bslang ba dang /
T02D2593:18b-15: dkon mchog gsum la bslang ba dang /
T02D2593:18b-16: sa bdag la sogs pa la bslang ba'o //
T02D2593:18b-17: de nas yid kyis sa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can /
T02D2593:18b-18: lag na gser gyi bum pa thogs pa cig /
T02D2593:18b-19: sa'i 'og nas sku phyed tsam 'thon par bsams la
T02D2593:18b-20: / spos chus brlan par byas pa'i lag pas sa la lan gsum brdabs la /
T02D2593:18b-21: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2593:18b-22: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
T02D2593:18b-23: sa dang pa rol phyin pa la //
T02D2593:18b-24: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D2593:18b-25: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D2593:18b-26: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar //
T02D2593:18b-27: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02D2593:18b-28: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2593:18b-30: sa'i lha mo'i zhal nas khyod ci bde bar bris
T02D2593:18b-31: shig zer nas sa'i nang du thim par bsam mo
T02D2593:18b-32: // yang na dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mandala khru gang gru bzhi pa cig byas la /
T02D2593:18b-33: der mchod pa rnams pa lnga dang gtor ma cha gcig bshams la /
T02D2593:18b-34: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul te /
T02D2593:18b-35: spos kyi snod thogs te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02D2593:18b-36: dgongs shig bdag la sangs rgyas dgongs //
T02D2593:18b-37: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang //
T02D2593:18b-38: sems can rnams la sman slad du //
T02D2593:18b-39: rnam par snang mdzad chen po yi //
T02D2593:18b-41: rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis //
T02D2593:18b-42: bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02D2593:18b-43: de skad ces lan gsum brjod pas /
T02D2593:18b-44: dkon mchog gsum gyis ngang ba byin par bsam mo //
T02D2593:19a-0: yang gtor ma aa k'a ro la sogs pas @19a * //
T02D2593:19a-2: dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gtor ma byin la /
T02D2593:19a-3: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te spos thogs te /
T02D2593:19a-4: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i lha klu dang //
T02D2593:19a-5: gnod spyin dri za lha ma yin //
T02D2593:19a-6: yang dag rdzu 'phrul cher ldan pa'i //
T02D2593:19a-8: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02D2593:19a-9: sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang //
T02D2593:19a-10: sems can rnams la phan don du //
T02D2593:19a-12: ji ltar bsams pa bzhin 'bri na //
T02D2593:19a-13: khyed kyis bar chad ma byed par //
T02D2593:19a-14: dge ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod //
T02D2593:19a-15: da ltar bdag gis khyod la ni //
T02D2593:19a-16: bzod bar gsol gyis mi slu bar //
T02D2593:19a-17: rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yi //
T02D2593:19a-18: legs nyes ltas rnams ba stan du gsol //
T02D2593:19a-19: lan gsum gsol ba btab pas /
T02D2593:19a-20: sa bdag la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyis shig pa'i ngang ba byin par bsam mo //
T02D2593:19a-21: de nas chag chag dang skyang nul legs par bya ste /
T02D2593:19a-22: rdo rje gnod spyin gyi sngags kyis /
T02D2593:19a-23: yungs kar gtor zhing bgegs bskrad nas /
T02D2593:19a-25: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba lan gsum mam /
T02D2593:19a-26: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya'o //
T02D2593:19a-27: de nas zhi ba'i spyin sreg gis bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o //
T02D2593:19a-28: yang na dang por sa'i pra brtag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2593:19a-30: rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyi pus mo nub tsam mam lte ba nub tsam bkros la /
T02D2593:19a-31: de yang gong gi sa'i lha mo nam mkha' la
T02D2593:19a-32: aom badzra au pa ta ya zhes brjod la gdeg
T02D2593:19a-33: / de nas dong gi nang du chus bkang ste
T02D2593:19a-37: zlos shing shar phyogs su gom pa mi drag mi dal ba brgya phyin te /
T02D2593:19a-38: tshur log nas chu de ma skams na dngos grub yod par ston /
T02D2593:19a-39: chu skams na gzhan du spo bar bshad /
T02D2593:19a-40: de nas rdza so ma btang ba zhig tu rin
T02D2593:19a-41: po che sna lnga dang 'bru lnga dang sman dang
T02D2593:19a-42: snying po dang spos dang lnga blugs la /
T02D2593:19a-43: dong gi nang du gzhug go //
T02D2593:19a-44: de nas brkos pa'i sa de rdo rje gnod spyin
T02D2593:19a-45: gyi sngags btab pa'i spos chus bral brul du sprus
T02D2593:19b-0: lhag par gyur na dngos grub mchog yod @19b par ba stan /
T02D2593:19b-2: de nas rdo rje gnod spyin bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag gdab /
T02D2593:19b-3: 'thas par bcags la me long gi rgyab bzhin du
T02D2593:19b-4: byas pa ni sa las dang bya bas spyang ba'o
T02D2593:19b-5: // rdo rje gnod spyin nam rdo rje rtse mo bzlas pa'i spos chus bsang gtor bya ba dang /
T02D2593:19b-6: zhi ba'i spyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang /
T02D2593:19b-7: yungs kar gyis gtor ba ni sngags kyis spyang ba'o //
T02D2593:19b-8: ting nge 'dzin gyis spyang ba ni /
T02D2593:19b-9: slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la /
T02D2593:19b-10: rdo rje chen po nas gzhal yas khang la thug
T02D2593:19b-11: ba'i bar du bsgoms la sgo bzhi rta babs dang
T02D2593:19b-12: bcas pa'i nang du sa chud par bsgom par bya'o
T02D2593:19b-14: de nas slob dpon lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
T02D2593:19b-15: sa phyogs 'di nyid du bdag rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2593:19b-16: kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya'o zhes bsam
T02D2593:19b-17: pa sngon du btang ba ni /
T02D2593:19b-18: sems kyi dbang gis sa bzung ba'o //
T02D2593:19b-19: de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas /
T02D2593:19b-20: ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02D2593:19b-27: zhes zlos shing 'dug pa yan chad ni /
T02D2593:19b-28: slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D2593:19b-29: de nas bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog rigs bzhi'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa bzhis /
T02D2593:19b-30: shar phyogs kyi sgo nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de /
T02D2593:19b-31: mtshan brgya rtse brgyang 'di dag gis //
T02D2593:19b-32: bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis //
T02D2593:19b-33: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzad //
T02D2593:19b-34: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02D2593:19b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che //
T02D2593:19b-36: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02D2593:19b-38: bgegs tshar gcad par gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02D2593:19b-39: de la mig byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D2593:19b-40: g-yas su ma las nyi ma g-yon du ta las zla ba /
T02D2593:19b-41: de gnyis kyi steng du h'um gis mig 'bras tshul du byas pa ni mig byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2593:19b-42: rkang mthil gnyis su aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom pa na rkang pa brlab pa'o //
T02D2593:19b-43: bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02D2593:19b-44: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02D2593:19b-45: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02D2593:19b-46: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid //
T02D2593:20a-0: bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag / byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor @20a * //
T02D2593:20a-2: / rdo rje lta bas tshar bcad pa'i mig g-yon
T02D2593:20a-3: gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor g-yon phyogs su bskor bas
T02D2593:20a-4: / bgegs thams cad gsal btab par bsam /
T02D2593:20a-5: g-yas kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis g-yas phyogs su bskor bas bgegs thams cad bsreg par bsam mo //
T02D2593:20a-6: de ni rdo rje lta bas tshar gcod do //
T02D2593:20a-7: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas byang shar mtshams
T02D2593:20a-8: su byis pa gzhon du bzhin du mchongs te phyin
T02D2593:20a-9: la / kha lho phyogs su bltas la /
T02D2593:20a-11: rdo rje lan gsum gsor zhing /
T02D2593:20a-13: rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas /
T02D2593:20a-14: slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba /
T02D2593:20a-15: rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2593:20a-16: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2593:20a-17: sa phyogs 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ngas 'bri yis ;
T02D2593:20a-31: rgan mo g-yog dang 'khor du bcas pa /
T02D2593:20a-32: gang dag 'khod pa de dag dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas //
T02D2593:20a-33: myur ba nyid du dengs shig / gang dag mi
T02D2593:20a-34: 'gro ba de dag nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rje
T02D2593:20a-35: mgo tshal ba brgyar dvags par bya'o zhes lan gsum
T02D2593:20a-36: brjod do // de nas rkang pa'i sor mos rdo rje rtse gcig pas la 'bri zhing /
T02D2593:20a-37: h'um h'um zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor bskor ba ni rdo rje 'gros kyis tshar gcad pa'o //
T02D2593:20a-38: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir rkang stabs bdun dang /
T02D2593:20a-39: lag stabs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bya ba ni /
T02D2593:20a-40: rdo rje stangs stabs kyis thams cad thal kar gcig pu'am /
T02D2593:20a-41: yang na de bas mang yang rung //
T02D2593:20a-42: shar gyi phyogs su gzugs par bya //
T02D2593:20a-43: phog phor kham pa las byas pa //
T02D2593:20a-44: so ma btang ba dkar po bcu //
T02D2593:20a-45: byas nas phyogs dang mtshams su ni //
T02D2593:20a-46: brgyang pa de bzhin ba dun du dgod //
T02D2593:20a-47: pog phor dag tu ma 'byor na //
T02D2593:20a-48: kham pa'i phor bu'i nang nas dbul //
T02D2593:20a-49: de dag kyang ni ma 'byor na //
T02D2593:20b-0: gcig @20b cig sgor ni gzhag nas dbul //
T02D2593:20b-1: me tog phreng bas brgyan pa yi //
T02D2593:20b-2: rta babs dag kyang phyogs bzhir bya //
T02D2593:20b-3: nas dang gro dang 'bru rnams kyi //
T02D2593:20b-4: myu gu legs par skye bar dgod //
T02D2593:20b-5: dril bu gdugs dang rnga yab dang //
T02D2593:20b-6: srad bu dag kyang phyogs bzhir ni //
T02D2593:20b-7: rta babs sogs las phyi rol du //
T02D2593:20b-8: mdzes par bya phyir mkhas bas gdags //
T02D2593:20b-10: me tog sil ma rab tu dgram //
T02D2593:20b-11: dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol du //
T02D2593:20b-12: phyi ma'i ri mo sdu gu bri //
T02D2593:20b-14: bkra shis la sogs gang yin rnams //
T02D2593:20b-15: dkyil 'khor bdag gi phyi rol du ;
T02D2593:20b-16: / phyogs bzhi dag tu mkhas pas dgod //

T02D2593:21b-13: ngas khyod la ya shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'ang thob na /

T02D2593:21b-47: cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02D2593:22a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la @22a * //

T02D2593:22a-4: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste /

T02D2593:22a-15: rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi snying

T02D2593:22a-41: gnas kyi khyad par las brtag par bya ste /
T02D2593:22a-42: gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi //

T02D2593:23a-0: nye bar mtshon nas de la mig gis @23a * //

T02D2593:23b-33: yon bzhin du slob dpon la dbul bar ba stan

T02D2593:24b-0: ba'i @24b dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams
